nodes.text: A resistance group fought in the Battle of Slotern against the Galactic Empire before or during the year 1 BBY. Part of the resistance group on Slotern used starfighters to battle against the Imperial TIE fighters, while another part of the group was on the ground. Every member of the group that participated in the battle died with the exception of Lieutenant Blair, who managed to survive the aerial assault.

The resistance group was first mentioned in the "TIE fighter" entry in the in-game databank of the PlayStation 3/Xbox 360 versions of the LucasArts video game Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II, which was released on October 26, 2010.
